column9: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2019
column14: I love this lipstick! I have always liked the Buxom brand for lip products, but I have been searching for the shade Dolly for a few years now. I first found it at an outlet mall in Williamsburg VA and never saw it again. Finally came across something very similar with this lipstick in Dolly Dreamer. It is full coverage, goes on smoothly, looks great. Not drying at all and feels very smooth. I am going to order as many shades as I can now! Reasonably priced, too.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2020
column14: My first time trying buxom lipstick and it doesn’t disappoint. Such a beautiful color , you can’t ever go wrong with a nude and it does plump and make my lips look hydrated. I will be purchasing more colors

column9: Reviewed in the United States on February 26, 2020
column14: I like the color ok. (dolly dreamer) although the photos make it look more mauve than it really is. but there is zero plumping going on here, which is why I wanted to try it.  if it sounds too good to be true, it probably is!! bummer!

column9: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2019
column14: Long staying and doesn’t feather like other brands I have used in past.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2019
column14: Love the lipstick texture and the color. I have had lip cancer and it keeps my lips moist and protected.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2019
column14: Super soft and creamy. Perfect color. It does transfer a bit, however you don’t need much so reapplying isn’t much of an issue. I love it

column9: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2019
column14: Love this lipstick. Glides on smooth without being too shiny. Wears well. Good coverage.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2021
column14: What a waste of money.  I've heard that these lipsticks really work but apparently not this particular one.
